page.title: 13Day In The Life Of Michelle
page.content: 2I usually get up at 7.30 a.m. and put my school clothes on. For breakfast i have "Start" then i brush my teeth and comb my hair and wash. On the way to school i call for my friend Hayley. We play when we get to school until the bell goes at 9.00 a.m. We do maths and language work most mornings. We have playtime from 10.35 a.m. till 11.50 a.m. and before we go out to play we can buy crisps or biscuits. We break for lunch at 12.00 p.m. i have dinner in school. My break ends at 1.10 p.m. then i do singing art and craft, welsh or topic work. We have playtime at 2.30 p.m. and school ends at 3.40 p.m. When i get home i watch television and eat my tea.After tea i call for my friends and we sometimes play in the street or play up the mountain. I sometimes have beans and chips for supper and i go to bed at 9.30 p.m.
